import React, { useState } from 'react' import shortid from 'shortid' import './Cover.css' const Cover = (props) => { let [ word , setword ] = useState("") let handlevent = (e) => { e.preventDefault() props.onSubmit({ id: shortid.generate(), text : word }) } return (
The Word
{setword(e.target.value)}} value={word} />
The meaning
submit
play
) } export default Cover
